name: Fruusthene
startIntroPart1: Oh, a new discovery, good to know, how are you?
startIntroPart2: We are a strong nation, don't even think about getting in our way.
attacked: You plan to invade us, you will regret it!
defeated: How could we lose! I assure you that you are not that strong, I congratulate you warrior.
introduction: Everything belongs to us, do you agree? Welcome
hateHello: What do you want now, let it be the last time!
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Haha... I hope you don't intervene again or we will burn you to ashes!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: [+2 Production, +5 Food] [in all cities] <before discovering[Steam Power]>
